column2: BRIEF-Arc Document Solutions Q1 Sales Fell 1 Pct To $97.7 Mln May 1 (Reuters) - ARC Document Solutions Inc: * ARC DOCUMENT SOLUTIONS REPORTS RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER 2018 * SEES 2018 ANNUAL CASH PROVIDED BY OPERATING ACTIVITIES PROJECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $44 TO $50 MILLION * SEES 2018 ANNUAL ADJUSTED EBITDA FORECAST TO BE IN RANGE OF $48 TO $54 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
